title: 06/18/21 DPS Best of
itunes:title: 06/18/21 DPS Best of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre, in for Dan Patrick, react to the Bucks forcing Game 7 against the Nets. The guys debate whether or not the jury is still out on Ty Lue's coaching abilities. Doug and Jason discuss Doc Rivers' playoff struggles and look at potential trade spots for Ben Simmons. 10-year NBA veteran Ryan Hollins joins the guys to discuss the brewing drama with the Dallas Mavericks and look at the Clippers attempting to get to the Finals without Kawhi Leonard.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
